Ethmi

My theory is that neither McCain or Obama would live through a four year term. If Obama wins, some redneck will shoot him. If McCain wins, well, how old is he now? Seventy-four? The President of the US has a remarkably stressful job. He'd probably get a heart attack and die. Maybe it's Palin and Biden we need to focus on?

post_info.post_title: Should we worry about the Cantidates or their VPs?

Jo Bennett

I'd have thought that if ever motive to top a president could be found, it was against Bush. I reckon the secret service know how to keep the president safe - the problem comes if Obama actually is a liberal, and wants to actually see the people who disagree with him, rather than have them penned up miles away in "free speech" zones.
 
 I also can't help thinking the supposition of a redneck out to kill Obama sounds like a personal threat from someone like Ethmi rather than political analysis :p.
Ethmi

I'd have thought that if ever motive to top a president could be found, it was against Bush. I reckon the secret service know how to keep the president safe - the problem comes if Obama actually is a liberal, and wants to actually see the people who disagree with him, rather than have them penned up miles away in "free speech" zones.

 
 If that's so, then why did he threaten to file lawsuits against the NRA for telling the truth?
 
 
I also can't help thinking the supposition of a redneck out to kill Obama sounds like a personal threat from someone like Ethmi rather than political analysis :p.

 
 What? Now you're calling me a redneck? You truly do think we live in a world of sunshine and rainbows, don't you? There are millions of racists all over the world.
ServantOfChrist

My theory is that neither McCain or Obama would live through a four year term. If Obama wins, some redneck will shoot him. If McCain wins, well, how old is he now? Seventy-four? The President of the US has a remarkably stressful job. He'd probably get a heart attack and die. Maybe it's Palin and Biden we need to focus on?

 Both good points. also we know next to nothing about Obama's medical record - he's running basically on a doctor's note that you'd get in grade school. We do know that he smoked al lthe way up until he entered the race, so lung cancer is a very strong possibility, as well as other smoking related problems.
 
 But I think if anything happens to Obama it will be from a racist that doesn't want a black dude calling the shots.
 
 Now, of course, if that happens with Obama as president, we get his fellow nutcase Biden, and we'll quickly be marching off to war in Africa (Sudan, etc.). 
 
 And let's not mention the Patriot Act came largely from Biden's proposed patriot act prototype that got shot down when he proposed it way back after the OK City bombings. In fact he quite bragged that it was basically wht he proposed back when it was first proposed after 9/11.
simone

In McCain's position, very much yes. The survival stats are against him.
 
 As far as Obama, yes, an idiotic rightwing terrorist might try to take him out but other than being gunned down by a terrorist, his health is good.
snakespit
As far as I am concerned, Biden is the only one of the 4 that I would somewhat trust to run this country. And even then, I don't trust him much.
snakespit

I also can't help thinking the supposition of a redneck out to kill Obama sounds like a personal threat from someone like Ethmi rather than political analysis :p.

 That's pretty ignorant Jo.

In McCain's position, very much yes. The survival stats are against him.
 
 As far as Obama, yes, an idiotic rightwing terrorist might try to take him out but other than being gunned down by a terrorist, his health is good.

 
 And we know this how exactly? Quite interesting that he is running on little more than a doctor's note from high school (which is what his one page "statement" is the equivalent of).
 
 Quite interesting that he refuses to release his medical records - McCain did it willingly, and so have basically every candidate in the past. 
 
 Something to hide there Obama? Unwilling to let us know the details of your medical history?

 If Biden gets in (through death of Obama) we're marching out of Iraq (maybe) and straight into war in Africa.

That's pretty ignorant Jo.

 
 
 I agree, as ignorance goes, redneck threats to kill the president are pretty high on the scale.

And we know this how exactly? Quite interesting that he is running on little more than a doctor's note from high school (which is what his one page "statement" is the equivalent of).
 
 Quite interesting that he refuses to release his medical records - McCain did it willingly, and so have basically every candidate in the past. 
 
 Something to hide there Obama? Unwilling to let us know the details of your medical history?

 
 You said above that he smoked up until the start of the campaign. That isn't accurate as he is still smoking now. I recently saw a photo of him with a pack in his shirt pocket. 
 
 And you ask an excellent question, what does he have to hide? Even Clinton eventually came up with a doctored medical report. But the liberal media wont demand that he do what they would be attacking McCain for if he refused to produce medical records.
Shooterandproud

Personally, I don't think the presidents will by dying anytime soon. Obama is young, and no redneck will get past the security, no matter how desperate. McCain will have access to the country's best medical technology.
 
 This is a good thing. Although I prefer Obama, both candidates are OK choices.
 
 The VPs, not so much so. I really like Biden, however Sarah Palin is, for lack of a better term, a joke. Shes a pentacostal moose hunting creationist that is for government control of women and their pregnancies. She is attractive because she doesn't seem like just another lying cheating politician, however when one looks at what Palin believes, most intelligent Americans should be mortified. Luckily, she is running for VP, and not the President.
